description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2022-09-23 at 2:00PM CDT. All bids submitted after 2:00PM CDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.  The Department of National Defence (DND), 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn, Personnel Support Program (PSP) located in Dundurn, Saskatchewan requires the supply and delivery of Outdoor Fitness Equipment \\(Individual / Combine Fitness Stations, use of equipment and warning Signs. All Outdoor Fitness Equipment and warning sign must be delivered not later than March 1st, 2023. The delivery must be made during regular hours between 08:00 to 16:00.The requirement is subject to the provisions of Canada Free Trade Agreement.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Title: {W2585-220005 Outdoor Fitness Equipment }

#### French: {W2585-220005 Équipement extérieur de conditionnement physique }

* Reference Number: WS3580110966-Doc3580199938
* Solicitation Number: WS3580110966

### Tender Details
* Tender Closing Date: 23 September 2022 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 1 March 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: 1 March 2024

### Procurement Information
* Procurement Category: Goods
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Delivery Information
* Regions of Delivery: 
  * Saskatchewan
  * Canada

### Contractor Information
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 
  11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
  Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User Information
* End User Entity Name: Office of the Ombudsman for the Department of National Defence and the Canadian Forces
* End User Entity Address: 
  100 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON, K1P 5M1, Canada

### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Ruwani Wall
* Contact Email: [ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND), located in Dundurn, Saskatchewan, requires the supply and delivery of Outdoor Fitness Equipment – Individual and Combine Fitness Stations, and warning signs. All equipment must be delivered not later than March 1st, 2023, during regular hours between 08:00 to 16:00. 

Note: This tender is subject to the provisions of Canada Free Trade Agreement. 

### Important Notice:
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 23 September 2022, 14:00:00. All bids submitted after 14:00:00 will be declared non-responsive.
